# sgp-greet component

Greet Component, renders a greet message to a name

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Usage

### Greet-default-example

<code>

    <sgp-greet />

</code>


### Greet-with-name-example

<code>

    <sgp-greet name={args.name} />

</code>



## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description   | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `name`   | `name`    | Name to greet | `string` | `null`  |
